mapper.insert: insert into upload_field (field_id, form_id, field_type, field_name, field_desc, field_order, create_time) values (0, #{formId}, #{fieldType}, #{fieldName}, #{fieldDesc}, #{fieldOrder}, now())
mapper.select: select * from upload_field where form_id = #{formId} order by field_order
select count(*) from upload_field where form_id = #{formId} and field_name = #{fieldName}
select * from upload_field_type order by type_order
mapper.insert: insert into upload_option (option_id, field_id, option_name) values ( 0, #{fieldId}, #{optionName})
mapper.select: select count(1) from upload_option where option_name = #{optionName} and field_id = #{fieldId}
select count(1) from upload_field where form_id = #{formId}
